concept.title: Setting Report Retention for Report History

conbody.p: When you create a report, it is set up by default to record history up to a retention period of seven days.
To change the default report history retention period for a given report:

ol.li: Click the Date Filters tab in the Report Wizard for the report.

Specify the retention period in days.
Figure 4-28: Data Filters Tab
Click Save or choose one of the following Save Options: Save and close, Save run and retain (for report history), or Save and run once (no history).
